assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Tafamidis_Renew_Patient_Overview_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: 1. Does the patient have any of the following new comorbidities/events? (Please check all that apply)
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Anemia (Hgb <90 g/L) Malignancies, including workup for suspected Falls and/or fractures Advanced dementia Palliative GI bleed requiring intervention Infections requiring hospitalization
